metadata.dc:author: Espinosa-Lara, M
Maldonado-Rodríguez, R
Peña Valdivia, B
metadata.dc:title: Estudio comparativo del efecto de 5-bromodesoxiuridina y de 5-hidroximetildesoxiuridina sobre el desarrollo de Escherichia coli auxotrofa a timidina.
[Comparative study of the effect of 5-bromodeoxyuridine and 5-hydroxymethyldeoxyuridine on the development of Escherichia coli auxotrophic for thymidine].
